headline: Seattle Tightens Measles Vaccination Enforcement
abstract: At a time when states and school districts are trying to increase vaccination rates, an aggressive strategy in Seattle appears to be paying off.
lead_paragraph: SEATTLE â€” After a measles outbreak sickened dozens of unvaccinated children in southwestern Washington State last year, school health administrators around the state went into crisis mode, intent on confronting the relatively low vaccination rates in the region.
